ERROR_MESSAGE.MUST_MATCH: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
ERROR_MESSAGE.MIN: The value must be higher than or equal to {{value}}.
ERROR_MESSAGE.MIN_LENGTH: The value must contain at least {{value}} characters.
ERROR_MESSAGE.MAX: The value must be less than or equal to {{value}}.
ERROR_MESSAGE.MAX_LENGTH: The value must not contain more than {{value}} characters.
ERROR_MESSAGE.EMAIL: Incorrect format of an email address.
ERROR_MESSAGE.LETTERS_NUMBERS: The value must contain letters and numbers only.
ERROR_MESSAGE.PASSWORD: The password must consist of letters (uppercase and lowercase), numbers and symbols.
ERROR_MESSAGE.VALID_NAME: The field should not start with a space and should not contain two or more spaces in a row.

BACKEND_ERRORS.USER_NOT_ALLOWED_BY_CLIENT: This user is not allowed by the client
